highlights.title: Footylight App
highlights.desc: Served football game content, achieving 32.4% MoM active user improvement using React Native and 4 microservices optimized for performance, cost, and high traffic.

highlights.title: FConnect Widget
highlights.desc: Worked on 26+ publishers’ APIs and 5 microservices using Elasticsearch, Node.js, and JS; performance optimization and 20%+ improvement in some metrics.

highlights.title: Data Pipeline Development
highlights.desc: 10+ data parsers with ELK, Docker, AWS ECS and Lambda, daily parsing.

highlights.title: Master Dashboard
highlights.desc: Internal monitoring dashboard for widgets, parsers, APIs, ads, and cost – used by multiple departments.

highlights.title: Widget Builder
highlights.desc: No-code widget generator with Next.js on AWS Amplify + S3.

highlights.title: First-Party Data
highlights.desc: System for user behavior tracking integrated with Google Analytics and cost management.

highlights.title: Inquiry System
highlights.desc: Worked on an inquiry system using PHP, SQL, and MySQL to improve data retrieval efficiency.
